Current Promotional Codes

WebzPro is offering 25% off for life! Coupon code “25LIFE”

This deal good for all payment terms. Choose any payment term. You can get up 25% off life. Upgrade/Downgrade anytime and and 25% off for life still applies!

Customer Support - We offer a true 24/7, 365 day Phone Support along with Help Desk Availability
24/7 ticket based support or if you need a quicker response all you need to do is call us toll free at 1-866-932-9323 ext. 3 and you can always talk to a tech 24/7.
We use several strategies to keep our Help Desk online where other hosts do not. Employing Redundant Internet connections is just one way that WebzPro, ensures availability of our staff to you at all times.

WebzPro is a Proud Member of the Better Business Bureau
As a BBBOnLine Reliability Participant, WebzPro is a member of the Better Business Bureau, and meets all BBB membership standards. WebzPro also complies with BBBonLine standards including the Code of Online Business Practices. WebzPro has agreed to work with its customers and the BBB to resolve complaints that might arise. WebzPro maintains an A+ rating with the BBB.

See Our Reviews at the Better Business Bureau!

We all know that almost all review sites and Top 10 ten sites are fake. The hosts pay to be ranked or pay an extremely high affiliate payout so the review site posts the reviews of the host. Any way you look at it top ten sites and most review sites are only motivated by the amount of money they can make so you can't trust the rankings at all.

That's why WebzPro is a member of the Better Business Bureau and our customer reviews are posted with them. All reviews submitted to the BBB are reviewed and verified by a BBB team member before the review is allowed to be posted.

Click here to see our reviews and see real customer feed back. We have customers with us for over 10 year now and the share their experience why they have been loyal customers for so long.
